variable.name: cigarettes per day
variable.description: Smoking quantity (SQ) questionnaire data - How many cigarettes a day do / did you smoke on average (on most days)? ; How many cigarillos do / did you smoke on an average day? ; How many cigars do / did you smoke in an average week?

variable.name: smoking initiation
variable.description: Smoking initiation. Questionnaire data - Have you ever smoked or used tobacco regularly for as long as a year?

variable.name: nicotine dependence
variable.description: Nicotine dependence is defined as a score of 4 or higher on the Fagerstrom Test for Nicotine Dependence (FTND) or endorsement of at least three of the seven Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders 4th edition (DSM-IV) criteria.
variable.value: nicotine dependent, defined as a FTND score >= 4 or at least three of the seven DSM-IV criteria (cases)
low-quantity smokers; fewer than 10 cigarettes per day and FTND=0 and/or social smokers (controls)
